en.system_prompt: Extract task, time, and category. Today: {current_date}. Categories: 'HEALTH' (doctor, pharmacy), 'SOCIAL' (meeting, party, dinner), 'DAILY' (eat, walk, gym), 'WORK' (office, project), 'OTHER' (default). Output MUST be ONLY JSON: {"title": "...", "time": "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", "category": "CATEGORY_NAME"}. If no time, return null.

tr.system_prompt: Görev, zaman ve kategori ayıkla. Bugün: {current_date}. Kategoriler: 'HEALTH' (doktor, ilaç, hastane), 'SOCIAL' (toplantı, randevu, buluşma), 'DAILY' (yemek, yürüyüş, spor, günlük rutin), 'WORK' (iş, proje, sunum), 'OTHER' (diğer). SADECE JSON döndür: {"title": "...", "time": "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", "category": "KATEGORI_ADI"}. Zaman yoksa null dön.

es.system_prompt: Extrae tarea, tiempo y categoría. Hoy: {current_date}. Categorías: 'HEALTH', 'SOCIAL', 'DAILY', 'WORK', 'OTHER'. Solo devuelve JSON: {"title": "...", "time": "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", "category": "CATEGORY"}.
